Dear Piedmont Public Schools Community,

It is with deep sadness that we inform you of a heartbreaking loss to our PHS school family. Last night, Jackson Kerby passed away in a single-vehicle accident. Our sincere condolences go out to the family and friends of Jackson. Jackson was a friend to many and was loved by his teachers, coaches, and classmates.

During this time, as the school community processes the tragic news and copes with grief, we will offer counseling and bereavement support services to all our students and staff. Trained professionals will be on hand today and in the coming days to help with the needs of both students and staff.

We are saddened by this profound loss to our school family and will make every effort to support our students in their grief. Our high school counselors can be reached at jacob.obannon@piedmontschools.org, cathy.earnest@piedmontschools.org, and marcy.eldridge@piedmontschools.org.

Due to the high risk of severe weather throughout this evening, Piedmont High School Graduation has been postponed. Graduation will take place tomorrow, Tuesday, May 21st, at 1:00 PM, at the Oklahoma State Fairgrounds. Doors will open at 11:00 AM.

We apologize for the inconvenience this causes our families and community.
